data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Jalna, Maharashtra, India.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jalna, Maharashtra, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Jalna, Maharashtra, India to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 1,913,682 lost people in  Jalna, Maharashtra, India have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 21,549 believers in the county of Jalna the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Ghadasi people.
Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the county of Jalna.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, help the 21,549 believers in Jalna to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.section_summary:
the county of Jalna, Maharashtra, India has a population of 1,959,000.

We estimate Jalna has 21,549 people who might know Jesus, 23,769 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,913,682 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 21,549 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Jalna.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

location.name: Jalna
location.people_groups_list: Vanjara, Bania Bannore, Kolhati, Rajput Mahratta (Muslim traditions), Bania Chaturth
